title: Club for bronze summoners.
body:
Hay everyone.
Ive created a club, mainly for bronze summoners.
Its called "Helping Others Improve"
Much like that league series Im doing.

The whole purpose of it, is those that are in it.
Agree and to get randomly spectated in their ranked games.
And them I try and help them out.

Only submit your summoner name if you are willing to be spectated.
and you actually want to improve.

Im not  a pro, but apparently I give good advice (According to random comments on my youtube)
If you have a bronze friend that keeps complaining why he is in there send him/her to this board.

replies.body:
Would love to have someone tweak my game up.
Ive tried 4 ranked games so far, but I keep getting matched with full team of golds/silvers. I get stomped and have never won a ranked yet so I gave up.

But if someone could guide me to my first win, I would be very keen to play more ranked and climb. I have a rl friend that would probably duo queue with me too.

Love to join if you have room -  SlothAlmighty

Since its your first time ever playing ranked your elo/mmr is silver 5(ish)
meaning you should get pared up with low Gold, silver and bronze.
Nothing wrong there.

The main issue is probably experience, you haven't played nearly enough games to be acquainted with every role and some champions.
Meaning you also don't have enough runes to help you.

I know this may suck, but I recommend chilling in normals for now or even ARAM for some fun and get to know some champions at random.

This should give you some ideas on how to play the game better passively.

-----

If people start being assholes, just mute them.
The more time you spend arguing / typing the less time you have to play.

So i did some hard research over the weekend, watched a heap of Blitz games and gathered as many tips and techniques as i could and put them into training. Also researched a heap of ADC and Support champs to know what their mechanics are so i know what to be prepared for...
I went 9-0 wins in norms playing Blitz, so decided to try my hand at ranked.
After having 8 losses at ranked previously I decided i'm forgetting about those, forgetting who my opponents might be and muted everyone before the game started.
Won first 2 games of ranked and got promoted straight into Bronze III. Thanks for the tips <3

It's hard for me to give tips in this situation. Since you are new, I cant say "practice on X" and stuff, because you need practice on everything.

Once you've played a shit ton of normal's you'll find yourself getting passively better and better at the game.
So until then just enjoy the game and have fun.
Exactly my plan mate, cheers

I've been playing for just over a year now, and suck as bot lane :/ 
I main jungle (levelled up playing it only) but I can also play top pretty good and barely play mid.

Man you go on massive loosing streaks, once you've lost a few games put it down and take a break.
ALOT of your games go for over 30-40 mins. But your CS doesn't match up to that.

Upgrade your trinket too, by lvl 12 you should have either red or blue, but if you already have 2 of each on your team. Its ok to stay yellow.

---

But once again same issue as a while bunch of dudes here.
for 1 year playing the game you don't seem to have many normals wins/losses.

--

Play  a shit ton of normals and you'll find yourself getting passively better at the game.

I would like to join, but Im not bronze myself. (Gold atm)
I just want to help other bronzes (who want to improve) improve since I was like that back then.

Invite me in if you dont mind to have another helper / coach =)
I agree with this guy I would love to help out in the club!
Add and invite me (same name as on here)

I think your in the same boat is the guy above, your both extremely new to the game, with only 100 Normal wins.
Work on just playing normal games getting used to every role with multiple champs, work on getting some tier 3 runes.

If you don't know what runes to get just copy mine. And alter how you see fit.
